title: IC-FOODS Launches New Initiative
summary: Announcement of Digital Farm Network project
description: IC-FOODS announces the launch of its Digital Farm Network initiative, aimed at connecting 10,000 smallholder farmers with digital tools and market information.

title: Research Partnership with University
summary: IC-FOODS partners with leading research institution
description: IC-FOODS enters into a strategic partnership with State University to advance research on food security metrics and digital agriculture solutions.

title: Award for Innovation
summary: IC-FOODS receives recognition for innovative approach
description: IC-FOODS receives the Global Food Security Innovation Award for its work in developing accessible digital tools for smallholder farmers.
